value.title: Soniox Debuts Speech AI Recognition Platform

value.title: Global Natural Language Processing Market (2020 to 2026) - by Component, Deployment Mode, Type, Application, Vertical and Region - ResearchAndMarkets.
value.excerpt: The Global Natural Language Processing Market was valued at $11.82 billion in 2020 and is projected to reach $53.08 billion by 2026.
